text: hi i'm vanessa from speak english with
vanessa calm a lot of students don't use
this expression naturally let's talk
about it recently i've heard a lot of my
students make a lot of mistakes with
this word what's the word a lot the word
is a lot but the problem is that they
don't use the word a lot instead they
say things like many people want to
speak english this sentence is fine
there's nothing grammatically wrong with
this sentence but it sounds a little bit
rigid or formal many people so instead i
want to encourage you to use the word a
lot a lot of people want to speak
english a lot I've heard sentences like
I ate many pieces of pizza today or I
drink many beers with my friends on the
weekend or I study English for many
times let's change this a little bit
instead of using the word many let's
simply use the word a lot a lot I ate a
lot of pizza yesterday I drank a lot of
beer with my friends I study English a
lot use the word a lot I'm going to be
giving some more details and sample
sentences on my website so if you're not
on my website at the moment click the
link below this video and you can read
the full free lesson see the sample
sentences and also write your own sample
sentences so it's your turn to make a
sentence with the word a lot a lot I'll
be looking forward to seeing your
sentences and talk to you later
good bye
[Music]
